quoteFirst: As I had several errands to do, I sent my maid ahead to the Grand Central Depot with orders to engage a stateroom and check my luggage. I forgot to notice how the time was passing till I caught sight of a clock in Madison Square pointing to
quoteLast: . I jumped into a hansom, but got to the station just in time to see the train steam away, with my maid hanging distractedly out of a window." She paused a moment. "A gentleman happened to be with me," she continued with downcast eyes, "so we consulted together as to what I had better do.
title: The House Opposite: A Mystery

quoteLast: , Miss Beckwith covered the first mile and a half in 18 minutes. Limehouse Church--a trifle over halfway--was passed in 33 minutes, and Greenwich Pier was reached in 1 hour 7 minutes 45 seconds.
